definitions.text: a wrong action attributable to bad judgment or ignorance or inattention
examples: she was quick to point out my errors
I could understand his English in spite of his grammatical faults

definitions.text: an understanding of something that is not correct
examples: he wasn't going to admit his mistake
make no mistake about his intentions
there must be some misunderstanding--I don't have a sister

definitions.text: part of a statement that is not correct
examples: the book was full of errors
Don't mistake her for her twin sister

definitions.text: to make a mistake or be incorrect
